short_summary: 3Y004-230018 Skid Steer for Polar Knowledge Canada (POLAR) To be delivered to Cambridge Bay, Nunavut by March 31, 2023.
description: Follow the notice: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15217401,   AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023 February 17 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
